# Natural Resources Canada SPTS 3.11 Communications Consultant

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 5000076225
* Amendment Number: 8
* Publication Date: November 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 14, 2023, 5:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* Amendment Date: December 14, 2023
* Status: Expiring

## Description

Natural Resources Canada is seeking a senior communications consultant to provide coordination expertise to support the Canadian Council of Forest Ministers and its working teams. The consultant will be responsible for delivering communications to internal and external audiences. The contract duration is from the award date to March 31, 2024, with two one-year option periods.

## Procurement Details

* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Contracting Entity: Natural Resources Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Gerald Baran
	+ Phone: (778) 350-9373
	+ Email: [gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
